42.eng-name: The Book of Hunting and Slaughtering

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Al-Hasan bin Muhammad, and 'Abdullah bin Muhammad, from their father, that 'Ali bin Abi Talib may Allah be please with him, said:"The Messenger of Allah forbade Mut'ah and the flesh of domesticated donkeys on the Day of Khaibar

chapter.ara-name: باب تَحْرِيمِ أَكْلِ لُحُومِ الْحُمُرِ الأَهْلِيَّةِ
chapter.eng-name: Prohibition Of Eating The Flesh Of Domesticated Donkeys
